name: Chooky Records
description: Introducing the innovative Chooky Records – a gateway to your exclusive share in the music industry; we release songs with high profile artists, each with its own digital collectibles. These collectibles are not just a digital item; it's your ticket to a lifetime connection with the songs and artists you love. Artists benefit from a higher royalty share than they get from traditional music labels, while Chooky Records gives them the freedom to release music as they wish and not forcing them. ​ Step into a realm where you become an integral part of the music creation process; Chooky Records will mirror the success stories of industry giants like Def Jam and Sony Records. Chooky Records offers you the chance to invest in your favorite songs and artists, aligning your success with theirs.
